data.name: Selenelion
data.detailed_description:
Return to the night of Friday the 13th.



In this game, you will control an unseen observer, exploring a special beach to find and collect figurines and items of interest. Little by little, the underlying story is revealed of two unique souls coming together.



You will experience the moments leading up to July the 13th, and relive the experience of a story delivered through animations and items found around different areas of the beach which are interactable and inspectable.



Experience a fun and calm gameplay exploration within a soothing environment, complete with ambient sounds.

Collect all the figurines and key items and interact and inspect them thoroughly to find clues.

And discover what makes the moon turn red!

data.short_description: A portal back to August, Friday the 13th, 2021.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window11
  • Processor: Amd 3rd Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 1650 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
